content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite appealing. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a suitable price for the apartment would be 500 euros per month. Considering the location and size of the apartment, it is a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 euros is much lower than I expected. I'm looking for a price closer to 800 euros per month. Do you think you could increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your expectations, but considering the market and the condition of the apartment, I think 600 euros per month is more reasonable. It is a good price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 euros is still below my asking price. I'm willing to negotiate, but I cannot go below 700 euros per month. This apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities. I'm sure you'll find it a great investment for your stay in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but 700 euros per month is still a bit high for me. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think 650 euros per month would be more reasonable. It's close to the market price and it's a fair price for both parties.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 650 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to compromise at 680 euros per month. This is the lowest I can go, considering the apartment's features and the competitive market. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your consideration. I agree to the price of 680 euros per month. I believe it's a fair price for both parties.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I agree to the price of 680 euros per month. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, and I look forward to our future cooperation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: The same goes for me. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any further questions, feel free to ask. Have a nice day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
